H0.text: In Christian art what does a painting termed a ‘Pieta’ depict. The Virgin Mary weeping alone

H1.text: In Christian art what does a painting termed a ‘Pieta’ depict. A group of angels surrounding Jesus

H2.text: In Christian art what does a painting termed a ‘Pieta’ depict. Jesus Christ standing after resurrection

H3.text: In Christian art what does a painting termed a ‘Pieta’ depict. Mary holding the dead body of
